snippet: A department within the New York University Tisch School of the Arts will soon begin accepting applicants for a bachelor of fine arts in game design.
abstract: A department within the New York University Tisch School of the Arts will soon begin accepting applicants for a bachelor of fine arts in game design.

headline.main: N.Y.U. to Add a Bachelor's Degree in Video Game Design
headline.print_headline: N.Y.U. Adding a B.F.A. In Video Game Design
